actors.name: Customer
actors.description: Places orders, provides feedback, and requests bills

actors.name: Head Chef
actors.description: Assigns dishes to chefs, marks dishes as cooked, and approves dish cancellations

actors.name: Chef
actors.description: Prepares dishes based on assigned orders

actors.name: Admin
actors.description: Manages menu items, inventory, and staff

use_cases.name: Place Order
use_cases.description: The system allows customers to place orders

use_cases.name: Cancel or Edit Order
use_cases.description: The system enables customers to cancel or edit orders

use_cases.name: Provide Feedback
use_cases.description: The system provides a feedback mechanism for customers

use_cases.name: Request Bill
use_cases.description: The system allows customers to request bills

use_cases.name: Ask for Help
use_cases.description: The system enables customers to ask for help

use_cases.name: Assign Dishes
use_cases.description: The system allows head chefs to assign dishes to chefs

use_cases.name: Mark Dishes as Cooked
use_cases.description: The system allows head chefs to mark dishes as cooked

use_cases.name: Approve Dish Cancellations
use_cases.description: The system allows head chefs to approve dish cancellations

use_cases.name: Manage Tables
use_cases.description: The system allows hall managers to manage tables

use_cases.name: Manage Orders
use_cases.description: The system allows hall managers to manage orders

use_cases.name: Manage Staff
use_cases.description: The system allows hall managers to manage staff

use_cases.name: Manage Menu Items
use_cases.description: The system allows admins to manage menu items

use_cases.name: Manage Inventory
use_cases.description: The system allows admins to manage inventory

use_cases.name: Manage Staff
use_cases.description: The system allows admins to manage staff
